biography.firstP: In the process of professional reconversion following the occurrence of a disability, my investigative profile and penchant for problem-solving have led me to venture into the field of web development.
biography.secondP: I have recently graduated from a Professional Training in Web Development (level 5) obtained at the CCI of Roanne with Garage404, and I would like to continue my learning by obtaining a diploma in Application Design and Development (level 6) through an apprenticeship.
biography.thirdP: I am, therefore, open to any proposal that would allow me to contribute my value to a company while evolving alongside it to continue gaining experience and applying my knowledge.
